SPOCK v2 Documentation

SPOCK (Speculoos Observatories sChedule maker) is a python package developed to handle the planification of observation of the SPECULOOS telescopes. The project SPECULOOS -Search for habitable Planets EClipsing ULtra-cOOl Stars â€“ searches for potentially habitable exoplanets around the smallest and coolest stars of the solar neighborhood Link to site.
